name: Untitled GB Game
description:
A lone gameboy developer finds the perfect game jam to enter. Self doubt and reverence  for the great classics hold her back as she journeys to come up with the perfect game idea.

Untitled GB Game is a retro walking simulator that you can actually play on a GameBoy, or emulator, or in your browser.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys / WASD

Interact - Alt / Z / J

Start - Enter / X / K
